survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, purchasing behaviors, and attitudes towards plant-based dairy alternatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear response capture. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: Which plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize key factors. Use a multi-choice question with a max selection constraint.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with max selection limit of 3

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based dairy alternatives compared to traditional dairy products?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based dairy alternatives compared to traditional dairy products?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Use a textbox for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
